abstract: A consumer group is urging Unilever, which makes Axe body spray, to “ax the Axe campaign,” saying it undermines the company’s other efforts to celebrate women of all sizes.
snippet: A consumer group is urging Unilever, which makes Axe body spray, to “ax the Axe campaign,” saying it undermines the company’s other efforts to celebrate women of all sizes.
lead_paragraph: The latest iteration of Unilever’s “Real Beauty” advertising campaign for Dove products, which celebrates women of all shapes and sizes, urges girls to reject the underfed and oversexualized images of women that dominate advertising.

headline.main: Unilever Shuns Stereotypes of Women (Unless Talking to Men)
headline.print_headline: Unilever Shuns Stereotypes of Women (Unless Talking to Men)
